text: The 1973 Australian Formula 2 Championship was a CAMS sanctioned motor racing title open to Australian Formula 2 racing cars.Australian Title Conditions, 1973 CAMS Manual of Motor Sport, pages 84-85 It was the seventh Australian Formula 2 Championship to be awarded by CAMS.CAMS Manual of Motor Sport 2002, page 14-6 The championship was dominated by multiple-championship winning driver Leo Geoghegan, who scored a perfect 54 points from six round wins over the course of the season. ==Calendar== The championship was contested over a seven-round series with one race per round.Australian Competition Yearbook, 1974 Edition, pages 78-97 {| class="wikitable" generated with :de:Wikipedia:Helferlein/VBA-Macro for EXCEL tableconversion V1.7<\hiddentext> |- style="font-weight:bold" | Round | Circuit | State | Date |- | height="13" align="center" | 1 | Hume Weir | Victoria | 3-Jun |- | height="13" align="center" | 2 | Oran Park | New South Wales | 5 August |- | height="13" align="center" | 3 | Amaroo Park | New South Wales | 19 August |- | height="13" align="center" | 4 | Surfers Paradise | Queensland | 2 September |- | height="13" align="center" | 5 | Symmons Plains | Tasmania | 23 September |- | height="13" align="center" | 6 | Adelaide International Raceway | South Australia | 7 October |- | height="13" align="center" | 7 | Calder | Victoria | 21-Oct |} ==Points system== Championship points were awarded on a 9-6-4-3-2-1 basis to the first six eligible finishers at each round. Only holders of a General Competition License issued by CAMS were eligible for points and each driver could retain points only from his/her best six round results. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" generated with :de:Wikipedia:Helferlein/VBA-Macro for EXCEL tableconversion V1.7<\hiddentext> |- style="font-weight:bold" | width="47" height="13" align="center" | Position | width="125" | Driver | width="200" | Car | width="250" | Entrant | width="53" align="center" | Hume Wr | width="47" align="center" | Oran Pk | width="44" align="center" | Amaroo | width="44" align="center" | Surfers | width="55" align="center" | Symmons | width="25" align="center" | AIR | width="39" align="center" | Calder | width="32" align="center" | Total |- | height="13" align="center" | 1 | Leo Geoghegan | Birrana 272 Ford Birrana 273 Ford | Grace Bros -
